Package com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.discovery.v1.model.environment

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EnvironmentManager
    Interface defining the constants and methods associated with Environments.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateEnvironmentRequest
    Request to create an Environment.
    CreateEnvironmentRequest.Builder  
    CreateEnvironmentResponse
    Response from a CreateEnvironmentRequest.
    DeleteEnvironmentRequest
    Request to delete an Environment.
    DeleteEnvironmentRequest.Builder  
    DeleteEnvironmentResponse
    Response from a DeleteEnvironmentRequest.
    DiskUsage
    DiskUsage contains storage information for the Environment.
    Environment
    Container where Collections and Configurations are stored.
    GetEnvironmentRequest
    Request to get an Environment.
    GetEnvironmentRequest.Builder  
    GetEnvironmentResponse
    Response from a GetEnvironmentRequest.
    GetEnvironmentsRequest
    Request to get a list of Environments.
    GetEnvironmentsRequest.Builder  
    GetEnvironmentsResponse
    Response from a GetEnvironmentsRequest.
    IndexCapacity
    Index capacity lists out disk and memory usage of the Environment.
    MemoryUsage
    MemoryUsage contains information about the RAM used.
    UpdateEnvironmentRequest
    Request to update an Environment.
    UpdateEnvironmentRequest.Builder  
    UpdateEnvironmentResponse
    Response from a UpdateEnvironmentRequest.

    CreateEnvironmentRequest.Size
